channel.title: git on zhili
channel.description: Recent content in git on zhili

item.title: 无法使用 git clone/push，kex ssh 密钥错误
item.description: git clone/push 我的 Github 私人仓库，通过ssh，命令行报错： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Cloning into 'test'... kex_exchange_identification: Connection closed by remote host Connection closed by 20.205.243.166 port 22 fatal: Could not read from remote repository. Please make sure you have the correct access rights and the repository exists. 但是关闭 clash 之后一切正常，看了下clash日志原来是机场屏蔽了22端口 改成通过443端口git clone就没问题了 ssh配置需要进行一下修改 https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/troubleshooting-ssh/using-ssh-over-the-https-port 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 cat ~/site/blog ❯ cat ~/.ssh/config Host github.com Hostname ssh.github.com Port 443 User git

item.title: git 出现错误Could not resolve host: github.com
item.description: 1 2 3 ❯ git clone https://github.com/Zhili/GameServer Cloning into 'GameServer'... fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/Zhili/GameServer/': Couldn't resolve host name (Just a little reminder) If you want the hostname also be resolved by the proxy (that means passing everything through the proxy), especially when you are cloning a gist, you can use the following setting (the key is that it uses socks5h instead of socks5): 1 git config --global http.proxy socks5h://127.
